• Citi ended nearly all of the institutional banking services offered in Russia as of March 31, 2023
• Largely completed wind-downs of Citi’s consumer and local commercial banking businesses

• Additionally, if a loss of control of the entity was to occur, then Citi would also recognize a loss of $0.9 billion on intercompany liabilities currently owed
